entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`word` TEXT NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`word`))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`packageName` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `icon` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`packageName`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`rowid` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `keywords` TEXT NOT NULL, `message` TEXT NOT NULL, `chat` TEXT NOT NULL, `app` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`app`) REFERENCES `selected_apps`(`packageName`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_keyword_matches_app
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_keyword_matches_app` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`app`)

indices.name: index_keyword_matches_message_chat_app
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_keyword_matches_message_chat_app` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`message`, `chat`, `app`)

entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`keywords` TEXT NOT NULL, `message` TEXT NOT NULL, `chat` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`keyword_matches`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_keyword_matches_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `keyword_matches` BEGIN DELETE FROM `keyword_matches_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_keyword_matches_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `keyword_matches` BEGIN DELETE FROM `keyword_matches_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_keyword_matches_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `keyword_matches` BEGIN INSERT INTO `keyword_matches_fts`(`docid`, `keywords`, `message`, `chat`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`keywords`, NEW.`message`, NEW.`chat`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_keyword_matches_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `keyword_matches` BEGIN INSERT INTO `keyword_matches_fts`(`docid`, `keywords`, `message`, `chat`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`keywords`, NEW.`message`, NEW.`chat`); END

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, '85394056c401c1f15682d4d73c82808b')
